hero.title: A new identity for your hotel
hero.body: Linnevik is a hotel wholesaler that has collaborated with many hotels in Sweden. Since 1986, Linnevik has developed and supported its customers in the design, development and production of bespoke hotel products and decorative textiles.

sampleCta.title: Unsure? Order samples!
sampleCta.body: You can order samples free of charge and the items will be delivered to your hotel. Experience the quality before you decide.
